tweets.text: We're mounting a wide-ranging investigation into reports of damage to the #RiverLugg, which is protected through SSSI status. We're treating this very seriously, working with @NaturalEngland & @ForestryComm who have taken immediate action to prevent any further works at the site. https://t.co/bvhnTETfal

urls.title: Flood and Coastal Engineering | Brunel University London
urls.description: This exciting new funded programme, developed in partnership with the Environment Agency will equip you with the knowledge you need for a successful career in flood risk management.

tweets.text:
Take your knowledge further with a Flood and Coastal Engineering MSc. 

Scholarships are available, full time for one year starting in September 2021 and will include a 3 month work placement at the @EnvAgency (subject to terms and conditions).

Apply now: https://t.co/cStzUAbhhi https://t.co/eoVU9cFApj

BEFORE & AFTER

Appalling #EcoVandalism at The #RiverLugg SSSI #Herefordshire

THIS IS ILLEGAL ACTIVITY

So it's a CRITICAL TEST CASE for environmental enforcement by @NaturalEngland @EnvAgency @DefraGovUK

The @WildlifeTrusts will be making sure appropriate legal action is taken https://t.co/U8lt4ZuX1t

A mile of the River Lugg has been bulldozed to destruction.
Bankside trees grubbed out & burnt.
Riverbed scraped out.
Meanders reprofiled.
Disaster for downstream wildlife.
This was an SSSI.
No consent was sought. 
@EnvAgency must surely prosecute this.
RT
https://t.co/cSBhrR2nDW
@RobGMacfarlane @EnvAgency Honestly, what is wrong with people? The culprit should cover every penny of the repairs. For however long it takes.

Day 3 of reducing plastic at Christmas: try swapping sticky tape with ribbon or string! üéÄ Did you know that it is estimated that 40 million rolls of sticky tape are used over the festive period? üéÅ  @EnvAgency https://t.co/VsXFoGY0SO

entity.name: Christmas
entity.description: This entity includes all conversations for Christmas for all years.

tweets.text:
We‚Äôve used our powers of entry at the River Lugg #Herefordshire incident

14 specialist officers from @EnvAgency @NaturalEngland @ForestryComm @WMerciaPolice @HfdsCouncil now on site gathering information & evidence. https://t.co/LLCOFQHCox

"Be in no doubt that anything less than a prosecution and full restoration of the river, paid for by the perpetrator, will be acceptable‚Äù.

@EnvAgency and others want to prove they are fit for the 21st century? Here's your chance. https://t.co/ji0wmcYyhf

@DaveThroupEA @EnvAgency @NaturalEngland @ForestryComm @WMerciaPolice @HfdsCouncil Well done - EA Drone operator surveying damage at River Lugg at Kingsland site this afternoon - picture editors more at Alamy Live News @guardian @guardianphotos #riverlugg @TelegraphPics https://t.co/SBFVor1VIu

@EnvAgency @RosieP4 @NaturalEngland @ForestryComm It's happening up & down the country - not just here. Nature, trees, wildlife, greenbelt, green spaces etc. are being destroyed at an alarming rate. Development & economy are king - HS2 as 1 example & billions¬£¬£¬£'s of planned roads another + #BuildBuildBuild on greenfield land.
@Freedomofdoubt @NaturalEngland @EnvAgency @ForestryComm Defra had a 40% departmental cut. And lost many of its best staff as a result

@NaturalEngland @EnvAgency @ForestryComm The perpetrators of this crime must be caught, prosecuted and punished appropriately for the blatant destructive action (with bulldozer!!) of this jewel of a river as a warning to others.

How is it possible that this type of destruction slipped through without you noticing?

Thank you to all the @NaturalEngland @EnvAgency @ForestryComm staff out on site working together to take action on reported damage at the #RiverLugg. Stop notices served and an investigation underway. https://t.co/moayq4k5aR
@CraigBennett3 @JohnSensible @NaturalEngland @EnvAgency @DefraGovUK @WildlifeTrusts Thats not the same location!!

tweets.text: Bonza day, planting trees on a hillside in Wales. No 'thunder snow' to report, but we did get lashed by old-fashioned sleet. Thousand native deciduous trees in the ground, on old sheep pasture. Thanks to everyone who has funded us, to make this happen. Good on ya. https://t.co/qtsHSu9HoK
